channel.title: My server dont have spwaning how do i get it back?
channel.description: what the title says, please help

item.title: My server dont have spwaning how do i get it back?
item.dc:creator: @Str3ngthzzz Str3ngthzzz
item.description:
@Str3ngthzzz wrote:

red arrow:

what the title says, please help

mmm k open client.java and search for else if (command.startsWith("yell")
above that add this else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 1)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 6529 10"); } } ::pickup should work now

save
compile
enjoy

Read full topic
